questions.text: a) Stock Arrangement should not be more than 10 ft height as under FMA 1967 Regulation 12, more 10 ft height, staff need to use rope or safety harness to climb the ladder. Signage available to show the limit (string, tape, color spray or paint).
b) OSHA guideline recommends the gap between inventory and water sprinklers, workplace roof, roof beams or light fittings and water sprinklers must be at Least 1m of clear space.
c) Heavy  items and unstable items must place below of stacking or racking.

a) Walkaway surface must be in safe condition (no damage floor, no uneven floor, not wet surface, , not blocking walkaway). If surface not safe, signage must be put in place for communicate purpose.

text: a) Safety file must be devided with below information:
i. OSH Committee Organization Chart

questions.text: a) Safety Meeting must be conducted every 3 month (compulsory). The meeting attendance must above 50% of total OSH Committee Member (Store and Mall). Workplace inspection must be conducted before OSH Committee Meeting.

text: a) Accident file must be arrange by month and year. Each accident must have complete document as follow - Incident Report (Japan Format)
b) Summary of 'Laporan Kemalangan dan Kejadian Bahaya'. Summary of accident (JKKP8) - every year.
c) Accident involve JKKP6 (MC more than 4 days) - If any. Each accident involve JKKP6 (MC more than 4 days must have complete documents as follow:
i. Incident Report (Japan Format)
ii. Security 'Laporan Kemalangan dan Kejadian Bahaya'
iii. JKKP9 - Data of Accident
iv. Incident Statement Form (Witness or Victim)
v. Minutes of Meeting
vi. Meeting Attendance
vii. Investigation Form
viii. JKKP6
x. Medical Leave or medical Report
